comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: From Wiki Elena Gerhardt (11 November 1883, Connewitz (nr. Leipzig) – 11 January 1961, London) was a German mezzo-soprano singer associated with the singing of German classical lieder, of which she was considered one of the great interpreters. She left Germany for good to live in London in October 1934. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elena_Gerhardt

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of April 6, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B0DE5DE103BE633A... indicates that Elena Gerhardt was in NYC in April 1913
